name: Bob the Brown-noser
description:
We are iceCreamScope, a group of game devs assembled for Unijam2020 at the University of Melbourne! This game was created in a week as the jam's entry.

The theme of Unijam2020 is connections.
The special bonus components are teddy bears, masks, and pancakes.

TEAM

Cynthia - Art & Programming
https://www.instagram.com/cynamiin/?hl=en

Kyla - Programming
https://www.linkedin.com/in/kyla-canares-4773a7187/

Mandy - Audio & Story
https://kowara.itch.io/

Stella - Programming
https://www.linkedin.com/in/yunzhi-stella-li-b4b113188/

HOW TO PLAY

Download the ZIP file and start the game.
In the game, type in the correct sentence when prompted while following the restrictions provided under the time limit.
Fail the stage if you run out of time and have to restart the stage.
Win the game by completing all five stages. 

Most importantly, enjoy the story!

NOTE: the Web version may contain some bugs compared to the downloadable version. A possible one is the ending credits not showing up, which will make you miss out on some post-story details. For the full experience, please play this version!

DISCLAIMER

All the people in this story are fictional. We may be pulling on stereotypes in the game, but this is just for funsies. Please don't take it too seriously!
